candidates.name: Ready to Build with Workers?
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Start building powerful edge applications with Clodo Framework and Cloudflare Workers.

candidates.name: Built-in Authentication Middleware:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Implement OAuth, JWT, and API key validation across all workers with zero setup

candidates.name: Standardized Authorization Patterns:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Role-based and attribute-based access control templates

candidates.name: Environment-Based Secrets Management:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Unified approach to handling API keys, tokens, and credentials across worker deployments

candidates.name: Input Validation Framework:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Schema-based validation to prevent injection attacks and malformed data processing

candidates.name: CORS and Security Headers:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Pre-configured templates for compliance requirements across all workers

candidates.name: Single Configuration Source:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Define worker behavior, environment variables, KV bindings, and Durable Objects once. All generated workers inherit these settings.

candidates.name: Batch Deployment:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Deploy 10, 50, or 100 workers with a single command. Clodo handles orchestration and rollout strategies.

candidates.name: Version Management:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Workers generated from the same Clodo template are version-aligned, enabling staged rollouts and canary deployments.

candidates.name: Automated Testing:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Pre-built test templates validate all generated workers against the same quality standards.

candidates.name: Infrastructure-as-Code:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Track all worker definitions in git. Regenerate workers from updated templates to manage fleet-wide changes.

candidates.name: Sign up for Cloudflare:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Create a free account at cloudflare.com

candidates.name: Install Wrangler CLI (optional):
candidates.acceptedAnswer: npm install -g wrangler or use npx wrangler for one-time commands

candidates.name: Authenticate with Wrangler:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: npx wrangler auth login

candidates.name: Create your first Cloudflare Worker:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: npx wrangler init my-worker

candidates.name: Develop locally with Wrangler:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: npx wrangler dev

candidates.name: Deploy globally with Wrangler:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: npx wrangler deploy
